AMMAN , JORDAN - More than 13,000 troops from 24 countries are to take part in the annual Eager Lion military exercise in Jordan , state news agency Petra said Sunday .
AMMAN , JORDAN - More than 13,000 troops from 24 countries are to take part in the annual Eager Lion military exercise in Jordan , state news agency Petra said Sunday .
